content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining Setup at (-10, -59)
Consists of following entities:
- 3 Burner mining drills in a row at positions (-10, -59), (-8, -59), (-6, -59)
- 3 Wooden chests at positions (-9.5, -57.5), (-7.5, -57.5), (-5.5, -57.5) collecting iron ore
Note: Currently all drills are out of fuel

### Iron Plate Production Line at (0, 0)
Consists of following entities:
- 4 Stone furnaces in a row at positions (0, 0), (2, 0), (4, 0), (6, 0)
- 4 Coal supply chests at positions (0.5, -2.5), (2.5, -2.5), (4.5, -2.5), (6.5, -2.5)
- 4 Burner inserters at positions (0.5, -1.5), (2.5, -1.5), (4.5, -1.5), (6.5, -1.5) moving coal from chests to furnaces
- 4 Burner inserters at positions (0.5, 1.5), (2.5, 1.5), (4.5, 1.5), (6.5, 1.5) moving iron plates from furnaces
- 4 Collection chests at positions (0.5, 2.5), (2.5, 2.5), (4.5, 2.5), (6.5, 2.5) for storing produced iron plates

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities in occupied spaces
- Before placing inserters or other entities, check if the target position is already occupied
- When restructuring a production line, remove existing entities before placing new ones in the same location
- Consider the tile dimensions of entities when planning placement locations

### Resource management issues
- Mining drills are non-functional due to lack of fuel - implement a fuel supply system
- Furnaces show "no ingredients to smelt" warning - ensure proper supply chain of raw materials
- Monitor fuel levels in burner inserters, especially at position (6.5, 1.5) which has low fuel
